verses.text: Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w fault|strong="H7451"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w transgress|strong="H5674"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*,

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* go \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* strange \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* adore \w them|strong="H6680"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w*. \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w host|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w* thou hast \w inquired|strong="H1875"\w* \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w found|strong="H3190"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

Thou shalt \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* most \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w city|strong="H8179"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* slain. \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, \w when|strong="H0176"\w* \w only|strong="H0259"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* beareth \w witness|strong="H5707"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w witnesses|strong="H5707"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w afterwards|strong="H0314"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w that|strong="H3605"\w* thou mayst \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thee.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou perceive \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H5927"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w among|strong="H0996"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w hard|strong="H6381"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* doubtful \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w cause|strong="H7379"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*, leprosy \w and|strong="H6965"\w* leprosy: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* thou \w see|strong="H6381"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w judges|strong="H0430"\w* \w within|strong="H0996"\w* thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* do vary: \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* race, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w ask|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* shew thee \w the|strong="H0853"\w* truth \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H6310"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* preside \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee,

\w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*; \w and|strong="H4941"\w* thou shalt follow \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w sentence|strong="H4941"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou decline \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* proud, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* refuse \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* commandment \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* ministereth \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* decree \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w take|strong="H5975"\w* \w away|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* afterwards swell \w with|strong="H3605"\w* pride.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* possessest \w it|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:

Thou shalt \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* number \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*. Thou mayst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w another|strong="H0251"\w* nation \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4616"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* lead \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w into|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, being lifted \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w number|strong="H7235"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H5483"\w*, \w especially|strong="H0853"\w* \w since|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H2088"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* allure \w his|strong="H5493"\w* \w mind|strong="H3824"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w immense|strong="H3966"\w* sums \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w is|strong="H6440"\w* raised \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w copy|strong="H4932"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w himself|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Deuteronomy \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* volume, taking \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w copy|strong="H4932"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Levitical|strong="H3881"\w* tribe,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonies, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* commanded \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*;

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* pride \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w nor|strong="H1115"\w* decline \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w or|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w reign|strong="H4467"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
